taskbody.context: To open the project in , do as follows:

step.cmd: Open , you are prompted to activate the Studio 30-day trial license. Fill in your username and password, then click Activate.
Once activated successfully, the Open Project dialog opens. Fill in the following information:

image.alt: Open the project in Studio Platform Edition

substep.cmd: Project: Select a Katalon project in the dropdown list. If you cannot find your project, click Fetch Project to fetch the latest projects.
Git Repository URL: Once selecting a project, will retrieve all Git repositories available in that project. Select a Git test project you want to open.
Username: Enter the username to access the Git repository.
Personal Access Token: Enter your personal access token (PAT). To generate a PAT, you can refer to this GitHub document: Create a Personal Access Token.
Branch: Choose a branch. If you cannot find a branch, click Fetch Branch to fetch the latest branches.
Local Location: Choose the local location to store the test project.

taskbody.result: You have successfully opened a Git test project in .
